Subject: Re: Ready to Scan

::Firearm::

The computer beeps, locking onto Hell Drak's signature.

"There," says Firearm, studying the report, "In the Predacon base."

The scanners reported that Decadel and Hell Drak were in Rampage's base. 
Acting on habit, Firearm opens a link to Kluster, closing it in a second as 
he remembers that Kluster is not Maximal commander. Instead, Firearm contacts 
Iron Raptor.

"Commander," he says into his comm, "A Maximal, named Hell Drak, has been 
captured by the Predacons. Firearm here, requesting troops for a rescue 
mission."
